resources.string:
Speaking assistant is a service to help users interact your devices with very new experience.
 It consists of many useful features as following
 1. Select all and read
 - Select and read all text in current screen of devices
 - For web, read all content in a website
 2. Draw and read
 - With some simple gesture, some rectangles will be drawns and read all text under this
 3. Summary
 - Some advanced machine learning algorithm is used to summarize long documents to save your time

Speaking assistant is a service to read all stuff displaying in your device. Tap or swipe your finger in an arbitrary areas to select them and hear what they are.

Some advanced machine learning algorithm to summary long document and read them aloud.
To use this application, you need to turn on Speaking Assistant in Accessibility settings.
To use this application, you need turn ON Speaking Assistant in Settings.
Scroll to bottom and find Speaking Assistant, turn it ON.
Press this for enter speak menu.
Press this then drag to choose and read speak field.
Press this to read all text.
Press this to read summary text.
Press this to close speak menu.
